message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate you coming down to $7,000.  However, I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $6,500?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I have to make a profit, you know. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $6,800? It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself!
